title: Outlook for the Gaming Industry & Ten Cars to Invest in for 2020
itunes:title: Outlook for the Gaming Industry & Ten Cars to Invest in for 2020
description:
Stan Pierre-Louis, President & CEO at Entertainment Software Association (ESA), discusses growth in the gaming industry and a new campaign called Game Generation. Bloomberg Pursuits Auto Columnist Hannah Elliot talks about ten cars to invest in for 2020.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
